channel.title: Needs helps on math queston(need answer within 12hours)!
channel.description:
The question is like this:
Find the two whole numbers less than 100 that satisfy all the following conditons. Show your proof to get full marks. -Divid by 2 gives the remainder of 1 -Divid by 3 gives the remainder of 1 -Divid by 4 gives the remainder of 1 -Divid by 5 gives the remainder of 0
i need answer real quick, i will be apreciated if u can tell me how to slove this?? :confused: ty =€
